```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
holiday_df <- read_csv(here("data/animal_crossing_holidays.csv"))
```

__Exercise 1__. The issue is that `Date4` has two __different__ formats (one is `year-day-month` while the oether is `day/month/year`), which creates problems for `lubridate` functions. 

__Exercise 2__. 

```{r}
## Date3
holiday_df |> mutate(Date_test = mdy(Date3)) |>
  select(Date_test, everything())
```

```{r}
## Date5
holiday_df |> mutate(Date_test = ymd(Date5)) |>
  select(Date_test, everything())
```
